titleStmt.title: A preservative for our money; or A way proposed, whereby some money may be kept in England which otherwise will all be gone or How we may carry on the war against France with vigour, and with much better effect than hitherto, and yet keep our money. By E.L.
titleStmt.author: Littleton, Edward, b. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by B. Motte, and are to be sold by E. Whitlock near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect as filmed; page 2, a blank, not photographed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
